title: Module not found: Can't resolve module
message: Error: Cannot find module 'module-name'
causes: Module is not installed in the project.
Incorrect module path or name.
solutions: Install the missing module using `npm install module-name`.
Check the module path and ensure it is correct.

title: SyntaxError: Unexpected token
message: SyntaxError: Unexpected token in JavaScript code
causes: Typo or syntax error in the code.
Using unsupported JavaScript features.
solutions: Check the file for syntax errors or missing imports.
Ensure the code is compatible with the Node.js version.

title: Error: listen EADDRINUSE
message: Port is already in use
causes: Another process is using the same port.
Server was not properly shut down.
solutions: Kill the process using the port: `kill -9 $(lsof -t -i:PORT)`.
Change the port number in the server configuration.

title: Error: Connection refused
message: Cannot connect to the database
causes: Incorrect database connection string.
Database server is not running.
solutions: Check the database connection string.
Ensure the database server is running.

title: Error: Cannot read property 'x' of undefined
message: Trying to access a property of an undefined object
causes: Object is not initialized before accessing its properties.
API data not loaded before accessing nested properties.
solutions: Add a loading check or default value (e.g., `data || {}`).
Use optional chaining (e.g., `data?.property`).

title: Error: Maximum call stack size exceeded
message: Recursion or infinite loop causing the call stack to overflow
causes: Recursive function without a base case.
Infinite loop due to state changes.
solutions: Add a termination condition to recursive functions.
Optimize re-renders with `React.memo` or `useMemo`.

title: Error: ENOENT: no such file or directory
message: File or directory not found
causes: Incorrect file path or name.
File or directory does not exist.
solutions: Check the file path and ensure it is correct.
Create the missing file or directory.

title: Error: Unhandled promise rejection
message: Promise rejection was not handled
causes: Missing error handling in async/await functions.
Error is not caught in the `catch` block.
solutions: Add error handling using `try/catch` in async functions.
Use `.catch()` or `try/catch` to handle errors in async/await functions.

title: Error: MongoDB connection failed
message: Failed to connect to MongoDB
causes: Incorrect MongoDB connection string.
MongoDB server is not running.
solutions: Check the MongoDB connection string.
Ensure the MongoDB server is running.

title: Error: Mongoose validation failed
message: Validation error when saving to MongoDB
causes: Required fields are missing.
Data does not match the schema definition.
solutions: Check the schema definition and ensure all required fields are provided.
Validate data before saving to the database.

title: Error: JWT token invalid
message: Invalid or expired JWT token
causes: Token is expired or malformed.
Secret key used to sign the token is incorrect.
solutions: Generate a new token with the correct secret key.
Check the token expiration time and renew if necessary.

title: Error: CORS policy blocked
message: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) error
causes: Backend server is not configured to allow requests from the frontend.
Missing CORS headers in the backend.
solutions: Install and configure the `cors` middleware in Node.js.
Set appropriate CORS headers in the backend.

title: Error: Environment variables not found
message: Environment variables are undefined
causes: Environment variables are not set in the system.
Environment variables are not loaded correctly.
solutions: Set environment variables in the system or `.env` file.
Restart the server after adding environment variables.

title: Error: File upload failed
message: Failed to upload file to the server
causes: File size exceeds the limit.
File type is not allowed.
solutions: Check the file size and ensure it is within the allowed limit.
Validate the file type before uploading.

title: Error: Rate limit exceeded
message: Too many requests to the API
causes: Excessive API calls during development or in a loop.
No throttling or debouncing on API requests.
solutions: Implement throttling/debouncing (e.g., with `lodash.debounce`).
Use API keys or caching to reduce requests.

title: Error: WebSocket connection failed
message: Failed to establish WebSocket connection
causes: WebSocket server is not running.
Incorrect WebSocket URL or protocol.
solutions: Ensure the WebSocket server is running.
Check the WebSocket URL and protocol.

title: Error: Memory leak detected
message: Memory usage increases over time
causes: Unremoved event listeners or timers.
Large data sets not being garbage collected.
solutions: Remove event listeners and timers in cleanup functions.
Optimize memory usage by reducing large data sets.

title: Error: Database query timeout
message: Database query took too long to execute
causes: Complex query with no indexes.
Database server is under heavy load.
solutions: Optimize the query by adding indexes.
Scale the database server to handle more load.

title: Error: Invalid JSON response
message: API returned invalid JSON
causes: Server returned malformed JSON.
API response is not properly formatted.
solutions: Check the API response and ensure it is valid JSON.
Handle JSON parsing errors in the client.

title: Error: SSL certificate issue
message: SSL certificate is invalid or expired
causes: SSL certificate is not properly configured.
Certificate has expired or is self-signed.
solutions: Renew or update the SSL certificate.
Use a valid SSL certificate from a trusted authority.

title: Error: File system permission denied
message: Cannot access file or directory due to permissions
causes: Incorrect file or directory permissions.
Running the server with insufficient privileges.
solutions: Change the file or directory permissions.
Run the server with elevated privileges (e.g., `sudo`).

title: Error: Database connection pool exhausted
message: Too many database connections
causes: Database connection pool size is too small.
Connections are not being released properly.
solutions: Increase the database connection pool size.
Ensure connections are released after use.

title: Error: Invalid session data
message: Session data is corrupted or invalid
causes: Session data is not properly serialized.
Session store is not configured correctly.
solutions: Check the session store configuration.
Ensure session data is properly serialized.

title: Error: API endpoint not found
message: 404 error when accessing an API endpoint
causes: Incorrect API endpoint URL.
API route is not defined in the server.
solutions: Check the API endpoint URL.
Define the missing API route in the server.

title: Error: Invalid input data
message: Invalid data provided to the API
causes: Missing or incorrect data fields.
Data validation failed.
solutions: Check the API request and ensure all required fields are provided.
Validate data before processing it.

title: Error: Server timeout
message: Server took too long to respond
causes: Heavy server load or slow database queries.
Network issues or high latency.
solutions: Optimize server performance and database queries.
Check the network connection and reduce latency.

title: Error: Invalid redirect URI
message: OAuth redirect URI is invalid
causes: Incorrect redirect URI in OAuth configuration.
Redirect URI does not match the registered URI.
solutions: Check the OAuth configuration and ensure the redirect URI is correct.
Register the correct redirect URI with the OAuth provider.

title: Error: Invalid API key
message: API key is invalid or expired
causes: Incorrect API key provided.
API key has expired or been revoked.
solutions: Check the API key and ensure it is correct.
Generate a new API key if necessary.

title: Error: Database deadlock
message: Database deadlock detected
causes: Multiple transactions are waiting for each other.
Poorly optimized database queries.
solutions: Optimize database queries to avoid deadlocks.
Use transaction retry logic to handle deadlocks.

title: Error: Invalid file format
message: File format is not supported
causes: File format is not supported by the server.
File is corrupted or malformed.
solutions: Check the file format and ensure it is supported.
Validate the file before processing it.

title: Error: Package not installed
message: Package or library is not installed in the project
causes: Package was not installed using `npm install` or `yarn add`.
Package is missing from `package.json`.
solutions: Install the missing package using `npm install package-name` or `yarn add package-name`.
Ensure the package is listed in `package.json`.

title: Error: Incorrect directory during installation
message: Package installed in the wrong directory
causes: Running `npm install` or `yarn add` in the wrong directory.
Global installation instead of local installation.
solutions: Ensure you are in the correct project directory before running `npm install` or `yarn add`.
Use `npm install --save` or `yarn add` for local installation.

title: Error: Peer dependency conflict
message: Conflicting versions of peer dependencies
causes: Different versions of the same package required by multiple dependencies.
Peer dependencies not properly resolved.
solutions: Check the peer dependencies and ensure compatible versions are installed.
Use `npm dedupe` or `yarn dedupe` to resolve conflicts.

title: Error: Missing script in package.json
message: Script defined in `package.json` is missing or incorrect
causes: Script name is misspelled or does not exist.
Script is not defined in `package.json`.
solutions: Check the `package.json` file and ensure the script is defined correctly.
Add the missing script to `package.json`.

title: Error: NPM/Yarn cache corruption
message: Package installation fails due to corrupted cache
causes: NPM or Yarn cache is corrupted.
Incomplete or failed package downloads.
solutions: Clear the NPM cache using `npm cache clean --force`.
Clear the Yarn cache using `yarn cache clean`.

title: Error: Invalid package.json
message: `package.json` file is invalid or malformed
causes: Syntax error in `package.json`.
Missing required fields in `package.json`.
solutions: Check the `package.json` file for syntax errors.
Ensure all required fields (e.g., `name`, `version`) are present.

title: Error: Global package not found
message: Globally installed package is not recognized
causes: Global package is not in the system's PATH.
Global package was not installed correctly.
solutions: Ensure the global package is installed using `npm install -g package-name`.
Add the global package path to the system's PATH environment variable.

title: Error: NPM/Yarn lockfile conflict
message: Conflicts in `package-lock.json` or `yarn.lock`
causes: Merge conflicts in `package-lock.json` or `yarn.lock`.
Different versions of dependencies installed by team members.
solutions: Resolve conflicts manually and regenerate the lockfile using `npm install` or `yarn`.
Ensure all team members use the same package manager and version.

title: Error: Missing dependency in production
message: Dependency is missing in production environment
causes: Dependency was not installed in production mode.
Dependency is listed in `devDependencies` instead of `dependencies`.
solutions: Install dependencies in production mode using `npm install --production`.
Move the dependency from `devDependencies` to `dependencies` in `package.json`.

title: Error: NPM/Yarn registry issue
message: Unable to connect to NPM or Yarn registry
causes: Network issues or firewall blocking access to the registry.
Registry URL is incorrect or outdated.
solutions: Check your internet connection and firewall settings.
Update the registry URL in `.npmrc` or `.yarnrc`.

title: Error: Invalid package version
message: Package version is invalid or not found
causes: Package version does not exist in the registry.
Incorrect version specified in `package.json`.
solutions: Check the package version in `package.json` and ensure it exists in the registry.
Use a valid version range (e.g., `^1.0.0`).

title: Error: Circular dependency detected
message: Circular dependency between modules
causes: Module A depends on Module B, and Module B depends on Module A.
Improper module organization.
solutions: Refactor the code to remove circular dependencies.
Use dependency injection or a mediator pattern to break the cycle.

title: Error: NPM/Yarn script timeout
message: Script execution timed out
causes: Script takes too long to execute.
Network or resource issues during script execution.
solutions: Optimize the script to reduce execution time.
Increase the timeout limit in the script configuration.

title: Error: Invalid NPM/Yarn configuration
message: NPM or Yarn configuration is invalid
causes: Incorrect settings in `.npmrc` or `.yarnrc`.
Global configuration conflicts with local configuration.
solutions: Check the `.npmrc` or `.yarnrc` file for incorrect settings.
Use `npm config edit` or `yarn config set` to update the configuration.

title: Error: Missing build script
message: Build script is missing or not defined
causes: Build script is not defined in `package.json`.
Build script is misspelled or incorrect.
solutions: Add the build script to `package.json`.
Check the script name and ensure it is correct.

title: Error: NPM/Yarn permission denied
message: Permission denied during package installation
causes: Insufficient permissions to write to the `node_modules` directory.
Running NPM or Yarn without sufficient privileges.
solutions: Run the command with elevated privileges (e.g., `sudo npm install`).
Change the ownership of the `node_modules` directory.

title: Error: NPM/Yarn outdated dependencies
message: Outdated dependencies in the project
causes: Dependencies have not been updated for a long time.
Newer versions of dependencies are available.
solutions: Update dependencies using `npm update` or `yarn upgrade`.
Check for breaking changes in the new versions before updating.

title: Error: NPM/Yarn workspace issue
message: Issues with NPM or Yarn workspaces
causes: Incorrect workspace configuration in `package.json`.
Dependencies not properly linked between workspaces.
solutions: Check the workspace configuration in `package.json`.
Use `npm link` or `yarn link` to link dependencies between workspaces.

title: Error: NPM/Yarn audit failure
message: Security vulnerabilities found in dependencies
causes: Dependencies have known security vulnerabilities.
Outdated or insecure packages.
solutions: Run `npm audit fix` or `yarn audit` to fix vulnerabilities.
Update or replace insecure packages.

title: Error: NPM/Yarn global package conflict
message: Conflict between global and local packages
causes: Global package version conflicts with local package version.
Global package is overriding local package.
solutions: Use local packages instead of global packages.
Ensure the correct version of the package is installed locally.

title: Error: Database connection timeout
message: Database connection timed out
causes: Database server is under heavy load.
Network issues or high latency.
solutions: Optimize database queries to reduce load.
Check the network connection and reduce latency.

title: Error: File system quota exceeded
message: File system quota has been exceeded
causes: Too many files or large files stored on the server.
Disk space is full.
solutions: Delete unnecessary files to free up disk space.
Increase the disk quota or move files to an external storage service.

title: Error: Environment variable not set
message: Environment variable is missing or not set
causes: Environment variable was not defined in the system.
Environment variable is not loaded correctly.
solutions: Set the environment variable in the system or `.env` file.
Restart the server after adding the environment variable.

title: Error: Invalid file path
message: File path is invalid or does not exist
causes: Incorrect file path specified in the code.
File or directory does not exist.
solutions: Check the file path and ensure it is correct.
Create the missing file or directory if necessary.

title: Error: Server crashed due to unhandled exception
message: Unhandled exception caused the server to crash
causes: Error was not caught in a try/catch block.
Asynchronous error was not handled properly.
solutions: Wrap the code in a try/catch block to handle exceptions.
Use `process.on('uncaughtException')` to handle uncaught errors.

title: Error: Invalid JSON data
message: JSON data is malformed or invalid
causes: JSON data is not properly formatted.
Incorrect data type used in JSON.
solutions: Validate the JSON data before processing it.
Use a JSON validator to check for errors.

title: Error: API rate limit exceeded
message: Too many requests to the API
causes: Excessive API calls during development or in a loop.
No throttling or debouncing on API requests.
solutions: Implement throttling/debouncing (e.g., with `lodash.debounce`).
Use API keys or caching to reduce requests.

title: Error: Invalid SSL certificate
message: SSL certificate is invalid or expired
causes: SSL certificate is not properly configured.
Certificate has expired or is self-signed.
solutions: Renew or update the SSL certificate.
Use a valid SSL certificate from a trusted authority.

title: Error: Database query failed
message: Database query returned an error
causes: Incorrect SQL syntax or query structure.
Database server is not responding.
solutions: Check the SQL query for syntax errors.
Ensure the database server is running and accessible.

title: Error: File upload failed
message: Failed to upload file to the server
causes: File size exceeds the limit.
File type is not allowed.
solutions: Check the file size and ensure it is within the allowed limit.
Validate the file type before uploading.

message: Session data is corrupted or invalid
causes: Session data is not properly serialized.
Session store is not configured correctly.
solutions: Check the session store configuration.
Ensure session data is properly serialized.

causes: Heavy server load or slow database queries.
Network issues or high latency.
solutions: Optimize server performance and database queries.

title: Error: Invalid redirect URI
message: OAuth redirect URI is invalid
causes: Incorrect redirect URI in OAuth configuration.
Redirect URI does not match the registered URI.
solutions: Check the OAuth configuration and ensure the redirect URI is correct.
Register the correct redirect URI with the OAuth provider.

title: Error: Invalid API key
message: API key is invalid or expired
causes: Incorrect API key provided.
API key has expired or been revoked.
solutions: Check the API key and ensure it is correct.
Generate a new API key if necessary.

Poorly optimized database queries.
solutions: Optimize database queries to avoid deadlocks.

causes: Unremoved event listeners or timers.
Large data sets not being garbage collected.
solutions: Remove event listeners and timers in cleanup functions.

title: Error: Invalid JSON response
message: API returned invalid JSON
causes: Server returned malformed JSON.
API response is not properly formatted.
solutions: Check the API response and ensure it is valid JSON.

title: Error: Authentication failed
message: User authentication failed
causes: Incorrect username or password.
Authentication token is invalid or expired.
solutions: Check the username and password for correctness.
Generate a new authentication token if necessary.

title: Error: Third-party API integration failed
message: Failed to integrate with a third-party API
causes: Incorrect API endpoint or parameters.
Third-party API is down or unreachable.
solutions: Check the API documentation and ensure the endpoint and parameters are correct.
Verify the third-party API status and retry the request.

message: Cannot access file or directory due to permissions
causes: Incorrect file or directory permissions.
Running the server with insufficient privileges.
solutions: Change the file or directory permissions.
Run the server with elevated privileges (e.g., `sudo`).

title: Error: Database connection pool exhausted
message: Too many database connections
causes: Database connection pool size is too small.
Connections are not being released properly.
solutions: Increase the database connection pool size.
Ensure connections are released after use.

message: Session data is corrupted or invalid
causes: Session data is not properly serialized.
Session store is not configured correctly.
solutions: Check the session store configuration.

causes: Incorrect API endpoint URL.

solutions: Check the API endpoint URL.

message: Invalid data provided to the API
causes: Missing or incorrect data fields.

solutions: Check the API request and ensure all required fields are provided.

message: Server took too long to respond
causes: Heavy server load or slow database queries.
Network issues or high latency.
solutions: Optimize server performance and database queries.

title: Error: Invalid redirect URI
message: OAuth redirect URI is invalid
causes: Incorrect redirect URI in OAuth configuration.
Redirect URI does not match the registered URI.
solutions: Check the OAuth configuration and ensure the redirect URI is correct.

title: Error: Invalid API key
message: API key is invalid or expired
causes: Incorrect API key provided.
API key has expired or been revoked.
solutions: Check the API key and ensure it is correct.

title: Error: Database deadlock
message: Database deadlock detected
causes: Multiple transactions are waiting for each other.
Poorly optimized database queries.
solutions: Optimize database queries to avoid deadlocks.
Use transaction retry logic to handle deadlocks.

title: Error: Invalid file format
message: File format is not supported
causes: File format is not supported by the server.
File is corrupted or malformed.
solutions: Check the file format and ensure it is supported.
Validate the file before processing it.

title: Error: Memory leak detected
message: Memory usage increases over time
causes: Unremoved event listeners or timers.
Large data sets not being garbage collected.
solutions: Remove event listeners and timers in cleanup functions.
Optimize memory usage by reducing large data sets.

title: Error: Invalid JSON response
message: API returned invalid JSON
causes: Server returned malformed JSON.
API response is not properly formatted.
solutions: Check the API response and ensure it is valid JSON.
Handle JSON parsing errors in the client.

title: Error: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability
message: User input renders as raw HTML, exposing XSS risks
causes: Using `dangerouslySetInnerHTML` without sanitizing input.
Improperly trusting user-generated content.
solutions: Sanitize input with a library like `sanitize-html`.
Avoid `dangerouslySetInnerHTML` unless absolutely necessary.

title: Error: Slow initial page load
message: Users experience a long delay before the app becomes interactive
causes: Large JavaScript bundles not optimized for production.
No lazy loading or code-splitting implemented.
solutions: Use `React.lazy` and `Suspense` for dynamic imports.
Analyze bundle size with tools like `webpack-bundle-analyzer` and optimize.

title: Error: i18n translation missing
message: UI shows untranslated keys (e.g., 'header.title') instead of text
causes: Missing translation strings in language files.
Incorrect key reference in `react-intl` or similar libraries.
solutions: Ensure all keys exist in translation files (e.g., `en.json`).
Provide fallback text with `defaultMessage` in i18n libraries.

title: Error: Accessibility focus trap
message: Keyboard users get stuck in a modal or component
causes: Modal lacks proper focus management or `tabIndex`.
No escape hatch (e.g., ESC key) to exit focusable areas.
solutions: Use a library like `react-focus-lock` for modals.
Add `onKeyDown` handlers to close modals on ESC.

title: Error: WebSocket connection dropping
message: Real-time features (e.g., chat) stop updating unexpectedly
causes: WebSocket connection not reconnecting after a drop.
No error handling for disconnected states.
solutions: Implement a reconnection logic with exponential backoff.
Show UI feedback (e.g., 'Reconnecting…') during disconnects.

title: Error: Package manager lockfile corruption
message: Install fails with errors about invalid `package-lock.json` or `yarn.lock`
causes: Manual edits or merges corrupting the lockfile.
Switching between `npm` and `yarn` without cleanup.
solutions: Delete the lockfile and regenerate with `npm install` or `yarn`.
Stick to one package manager across the project.

title: Error: Cryptographic operation failed
message: Encryption or decryption process failed
causes: Incorrect encryption key or algorithm.
Data is corrupted or tampered with during transmission.
solutions: Verify the encryption key and algorithm used.
Ensure data integrity by using hashing or checksums.

title: Error: Deployment failed due to missing files
message: Required files are missing during deployment
causes: Files were not included in the deployment package.
Build process did not copy necessary files.
solutions: Check the build process and ensure all required files are included.
Verify the deployment pipeline for missing file steps.

title: Error: Logging system not working
message: Logs are not being generated or stored
causes: Logging configuration is incorrect or missing.
Log files are not writable due to permissions.
solutions: Check the logging configuration (e.g., `winston`, `morgan`).
Ensure the log directory has proper write permissions.

title: Error: Event loop blocked
message: Node.js event loop is blocked, causing the server to freeze
causes: Synchronous code blocking the event loop.
Long-running operations without proper async handling.
solutions: Use asynchronous code for long-running operations.
Offload heavy tasks to worker threads or external services.

title: Error: Invalid DNS resolution
message: Failed to resolve a domain name to an IP address
causes: Incorrect domain name or DNS server issues.
Network configuration problems.
solutions: Check the domain name for typos or errors.
Verify DNS server settings and network connectivity.

title: Error: File descriptor limit exceeded
message: Too many open files, causing the server to crash
causes: File descriptors are not being closed properly.
System file descriptor limit is too low.
solutions: Ensure files and sockets are closed after use.
Increase the file descriptor limit using `ulimit`.

title: Error: Invalid character encoding
message: Text data is corrupted due to incorrect encoding
causes: Incorrect character encoding specified (e.g., UTF-8 vs. ASCII).
Data is being read or written with the wrong encoding.
solutions: Specify the correct character encoding when reading/writing files.
Use libraries like `iconv-lite` to handle encoding conversions.

title: Error: Server-side rendering (SSR) hydration mismatch
message: Server-rendered HTML does not match client-side rendering
causes: Differences in data between server and client.
Dynamic content not being handled correctly.
solutions: Ensure data consistency between server and client.
Use `suppressHydrationWarning` for non-critical mismatches.

title: Error: Invalid HTTP headers
message: HTTP headers are malformed or invalid
causes: Incorrect header format or values.
Headers exceed size limits.
solutions: Check the HTTP headers for correct formatting.
Ensure headers comply with size limits and standards.

title: Error: Invalid WebSocket frame
message: WebSocket connection failed due to invalid frame
causes: WebSocket client or server sent an invalid frame.
Data corruption during transmission.
solutions: Check the WebSocket implementation for frame handling.
Ensure data integrity by validating frames before processing.

title: Error: Invalid GraphQL query
message: GraphQL query is malformed or invalid
causes: Syntax error in the GraphQL query.
Query contains unsupported fields or arguments.
solutions: Validate the GraphQL query using a tool like GraphiQL.
Check the schema for supported fields and arguments.

title: Error: Invalid Docker container configuration
message: Docker container failed to start or run
causes: Incorrect Dockerfile configuration.
Missing or incorrect environment variables.
solutions: Check the Dockerfile for errors and missing dependencies.
Ensure all required environment variables are set.

title: Error: Invalid Kubernetes configuration
message: Kubernetes deployment or service failed
causes: Incorrect YAML configuration for pods or services.
Resource limits or requests are not properly set.
solutions: Validate the Kubernetes YAML files for errors.
Ensure resource limits and requests are correctly configured.

title: Error: Invalid Redis connection
message: Failed to connect to Redis server
causes: Incorrect Redis connection string or credentials.
Redis server is not running or unreachable.
solutions: Check the Redis connection string and credentials.
Ensure the Redis server is running and accessible.

title: Error: Invalid RabbitMQ configuration
message: Failed to connect to RabbitMQ or send messages
causes: Incorrect RabbitMQ connection settings.
Queue or exchange configuration is invalid.
solutions: Check the RabbitMQ connection settings.
Verify the queue and exchange configurations.

title: Error: Invalid Kafka configuration
message: Failed to produce or consume messages in Kafka
causes: Incorrect Kafka broker or topic configuration.
Consumer or producer settings are invalid.
solutions: Check the Kafka broker and topic configurations.
Verify the consumer and producer settings.

title: Error: Invalid Elasticsearch query
message: Elasticsearch query returned an error
causes: Syntax error in the Elasticsearch query.
Query contains unsupported fields or parameters.
solutions: Validate the Elasticsearch query using Kibana or a similar tool.
Check the Elasticsearch documentation for supported fields.

title: Error: Invalid AWS S3 configuration
message: Failed to upload or download files from AWS S3
causes: Incorrect AWS credentials or bucket permissions.
S3 bucket or file path is invalid.
solutions: Check the AWS credentials and bucket permissions.
Verify the S3 bucket and file path.

title: Error: Invalid Google Cloud Storage configuration
message: Failed to upload or download files from Google Cloud Storage
causes: Incorrect Google Cloud credentials or bucket permissions.
Bucket or file path is invalid.
solutions: Check the Google Cloud credentials and bucket permissions.
Verify the bucket and file path.

title: Error: Invalid Stripe API request
message: Stripe API request failed
causes: Incorrect API key or parameters.
Stripe API is down or unreachable.
solutions: Check the API key and parameters.
Verify the Stripe API status and retry the request.
